metadata.title: John McCain’s former Vietnamese jailor says he always respected the late senator | Fox News
metadata.description: The Vietnamese man who ran the infamous “Hanoi Hilton” prison, where the late Sen. John McCain was held as a prisoner of war for more than five years, paid respect to the former U.S. Navy pilot who later was instrumental in bringing the wartime foes together.
